I Am Sarah The

I specialize in responsive front end web development and website applications.

Learn More

What Every Project Receives...

I make sure that each of my creations live up to my standards.

Quality

I prioritize quality in all of my projects and make sure that each website exceeds your expectations.

User Friendly

My websites are built to put the consumers first. It's essential that every consumer has a great experience with your website so I prioritize the user friendliness of each project.

Interactive

My websites provide essential consumer interaction whether it's from an animation that shows up as you scroll or a cool affect when you hover over an object.

Concepting

I carefully listen to what you want in a website and begin my project by conceptualizing how to reach your goals and provide you with a valuable website.

Testimonial

Sarah had the ability to bring my vision to life. I am so pleased with the end result. I greatly recommend Sarah Beckley to anyone looking for a web designer/web developer to help bring their vision to life!

Process Of Development

All of my projects are completed through a four step process that ensures I create valuable websites that you love everytime.

1

Discuss

The first step includes discussing with my customers what they want in a website and make sure I to listen to every detail so I can create a product that will fulfill their goals.

2

Conceptualize

Then I visualize and map out what the website should look like. I create a blue print of the end product so I can plan out the details and necassary content.

3

Create

Then, once I know how it should look, I begin coding and testing out what should be modified. I create the project to fulfill the details that was discussed in step one and modify it to be interactive.

4

Assess

Lastly, I share the product with my customer and together we assess any changes that should be made. I'll finish up the website and confirm that it succeeds your expectations and offer future maintenance and update services.
